div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Affordable homes for rent available through the affordable housing program for qualifying future residents.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, find policies, and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: Renovated fitness center with cardio and strength equipment.
Furnished+ offers all the essential items you need to move in plus conveniences like flexible lease terms, included utilities, and immediate access to highspeed Wi-Fi and cable TV (Select Homes)
Eco-friendly community with recycling bins throughout and sustainable lighting techniques to reduce energy consumption

div.class: community-contact-info-mobile-bg absolute-top absolute-bottom community-contact-info-bg-overlay h-100 w-100 d-none-md

div.p: We are here for you. Let us know how we can help you find your perfect home.

Live Up."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}}]},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityDescription","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityDescription","id":"f0flrX8WhJT9dli","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"title":"Make Yourself at Home","description":"We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. There's more to love than ever before at the new phase of Avalon Irvine. With an exciting mix of contemporary and urban designs, luxurious on-site amenities and an ultra- convenient lifestyle location, you'll love everything about living at the Irvine apartments. More style. More choice. More convenience. What more can we say? At Avalon Irvine, experience all of Orange County's best! Enjoy brand new studios or one- and two-bedroom Irvine apartments equipped with fantastic amenities to make your life a little more comfortable. The exemplary location and fantastic facilities make this Avalon community a popular and appealing choice for an Irvine apartment rental. And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, Amazon package lockers, electronic locks, smart thermostats, and more. IRVINE APARTMENTS BY AVALON Our Irvine apartments are ideally situated in Irvines Central Business District providing you with easy access to wonderful shopping and dining options at The District, Market Place, and Diamond Jamboree. You can indulge in the beautiful art, photography and sculpture on display at the Irvine Fine Arts Center or enjoy some great music with amazing live shows at the Verizon Wireless Amphitheatre, and the prestigious UC Irvine and its stunning campus rests nearby for you to explore. The amazing city offers plenty of fun attractions to occupy yourself with in your free time near these apartments for rent in Irvine. IRVINE APARTMENT COMMUNITY Avalon offers a special program called the Avalon Advantage. Residents are privy to superb benefits such as a 30-day move-in guarantee, flexible lease terms, amenities on-site, maintenance response guarantees and a whole lot more. The Irvine apartments offer you a life of luxury and convenience where all your needs are given top priority. Our homes are ideal for singles and families alike. So choose your new home! Contact us to schedule an appointment and find out more about your new apartment in Irvine, Orange County.
